column5: Any suggestions on lodges in the Sioux Narrows area? We are looking for good walleye fishing and we break up the day by casting for northerns. We are looking at the end of July. Also condidering the Northwest Angle area. We cook our own meals so we are mainly looking for a roof over our head. Any suggestions are appreciated.
Try the search function on the tool bar above, plus try google. Good luck in your "search" for the right palce!

I would try the whitebirch lodge for a cabin. I've stayed there,nice place. For a roof and a bed I would try the motel formally known as the maple leaf motel. The place is under new ownership, probably the lowest cost.

Without a doubt, I would recommend Rod & Reel Resort in Sioux Narrows. Been going there for a few years and never been disappointed. Third generation family run resort, very reasonable, nice cabins, great staff and guides.
Lake of the Woods Island LodgeGreat lodge, very affordable. Located in Nestor Falls..same body of water as Soiux Narrows, just a bit south
